text: Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Technology is a Polish government administration office. The Ministry was established on 12 January 2018 (with effect from 9 January 2018) after separating from the existing Ministry of Development. ==Ministers== {| class="wikitable" |+ ! !Portrait !Name !Party ! colspan="2" |Term of office !Prime Minister (cabinet) |- ! style="width:2px;background:#4F42B5;" | |60px |Jadwiga Emilewicz |Agreement |9 January 2018 |15 November 2019 |Mateusz Morawiecki (Morawiecki) |} ==External links== * Official government website of Poland ==References== 2018 2018 Poland,2018 Category:2018 establishments in Poland
title: Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Technology
